title: The Burden of Truth
story: As the morning light struggles through the castle's grimy windows, fleeting visions of forgotten knowledge surface. There's a chance to unlock profound secrets, but delving into such truths risks shattering the mind.
effect: One hero may immediately attempt a special Memory Search: reveal 3 face-down cards instead of the usual 2. If an item match is made, that hero gains the item. Regardless of success or failure, the hero who performed this special search loses 2 Sanity from the mental strain. If no match is made, that hero also loses 1 Willpower in frustration.
